meanings.definition: A recording of the musical accompaniment to a movie.
meanings.sent1: The soundtracks for the film were beautifully composed.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to soundtracks while studying.
meanings.sent3: The soundtracks playing in the background made the movie even more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of soundtracks, each song representing a different chapter.
meanings.sent5: The soundtracks filled the room with emotion and drama.

meanings.definition: The music that accompanies a film or television program.
meanings.sent1: The soundtracks of this show always set the perfect mood.
meanings.sent2: Soundtracks can greatly enhance the viewing experience of a movie.
meanings.sent3: The soundtracks seemed to have a mind of their own, changing with each scene.
meanings.sent4: His words were like soundtracks, perfectly syncing with the emotions in the room.
meanings.sent5: The soundtracks of this film will stay with me long after the credits roll.

meanings.definition: The background music to a movie or video game.
meanings.sent1: The soundtracks in this game really immerse you in the world.
meanings.sent2: Soundtracks can make or break the atmosphere of a film.
meanings.sent3: The soundtracks in the movie were so catchy, they stuck in my head for days.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a soundtrack, bringing joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The soundtracks of the video game perfectly matched the intensity of the battles.
